    Introduction to adherenceFromOMOP

    adherenceFromOMOP.Rmd

    Get started with the basics.

    # ? mis see ootuspärane tegevuskava oleks 
# praegu on 
# - need kes ei sure ära
# - need kes surevad aga obs window on siis kõige varem sureva inimese järgi.
connection <- DBI::dbConnect(duckdb::duckdb(dbdir = CDMConnector::eunomiaDir()))

cdm <-  CDMConnector::cdmFromCon(con = connection,
                                     cdmSchema = "main",
                                     writeSchema = "main")


cdm <- AdherenceFromOMOP::generateChronicDrugExposure(cdm = cdm, 
                                   ingredient = c("acetaminophen", "metformin","simvastatin"), 
                                   name = "test_table", 
                                   overwrite = T,
                                   subjects = c(806,807))


calculateCMAs <- AdherenceFromOMOP::adherenceCalculations(cdm = cdm, 
                                ingredient = c("acetaminophen", "metformin", "simvastatin"), 
                                name = "test_table", 
                                gapEra = 1, 
                                cma = c("CMA1", "CMA2"),
                                observation.window.duration = 5000,
                                followup.window.duration = 6000)


plot(calculateCMAs$CMA1$defined_observation_window)

    Subsetting a cohort table that already exists. Subjects 47,36,2,75,100

    cdm <- AdherenceFromOMOP::generateChronicDrugExposure(cdm = cdm, 
                                   ingredient = c("acetaminophen", "metformin","simvastatin"), 
                                   name = "test_table_subjects", 
                                   overwrite = T,
                                   subjects = c(1:10),
                                   ageGroup = list(
      "0 to 17" = c(0, 17),
      "18 to 65" = c(18, 65),
      ">= 66" = c(66, Inf)
    ))

cma_all <- AdherenceFromOMOP::adherenceCalculations(cdm = cdm, 
                                ingredient = c("acetaminophen", "metformin", "simvastatin"), 
                                name = "test_table_subjects", 
                                gapEra = 1)


plot(cma_all$CMA5$defined_observation_window)

    Sliding window calculations.

    #TODO cohort def id  
cdm <- AdherenceFromOMOP::generateChronicDrugExposure(cdm = cdm, 
                                   ingredient = c("acetaminophen","metformin","simvastatin"), 
                                   name = "test_table_subjects", 
                                   overwrite = T,
                                   subjects = c(3))

cmad <- AdherenceFromOMOP::adherenceSlidingWindow(
  name = "test_table_subjects",
  cdm = cdm,
  person_id = NULL,
  observation.window.duration = 160,
  observation.window.start = 0,
  followup.window.duration = 180,
  sliding.window.start = 0,
  sliding.window.start.unit = c("days", "weeks", "months", "years")[1],
  sliding.window.duration = 2,
  sliding.window.duration.unit = c("days", "weeks", "months", "years")[3],
  sliding.window.step.duration = 3,
  sliding.window.step.unit = c("days", "weeks", "months", "years")[2]
)

plot(cmad$CMA2)
    cmad$CMA1$CMA
    cmd <-
